subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Eddie Jordan returned to Rutgers and took over as coach of the scandal-marred basketball program at the university embarrassed by abuses that forced the firing of Mike Rice.
snippet: Eddie Jordan returned to Rutgers and took over as coach of the scandal-marred basketball program at the university embarrassed by abuses that forced the firing of Mike Rice.
